cards.name: Bloodsoaked Champion
cards.text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid — {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.
cards.flavor: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."

cards.name: Monastery Swiftspear
cards.text:
Haste
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

cards.name: Secluded Steppe
cards.text:
Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Carrion Feeder
cards.text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
cards.flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

cards.name: Martyr of Ashes
cards.text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.
cards.flavor: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

cards.name: Basking Rootwalla
cards.text:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Lonely Sandbar
cards.text:
Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Thraben Inspector
cards.text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
cards.flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

cards.name: Asylum Visitor
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: "The ravings of the mad are laced with eldritch knowledge."

cards.name: Abbot of Keral Keep
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Abbot of Keral Keep enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Birds of Paradise
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Each feather in its tail is a souvenir of an exotic land, a memory condensed in hue.

cards.name: Barren Moor
cards.text:
Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Precinct Captain
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

cards.name: Merfolk Looter
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

cards.name: Heir of Falkenrath
cards.text: Discard a card: Transform Heir of Falkenrath. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor: Among vampires, there has long been the belief that the urge to feed must be balanced by the poise of nobility.

cards.name: Plated Geopede
cards.text:
First strike
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Kor armorers buy the scales and claws. Elf oracles buy the rest."
—Nablus, North Hada trapper

cards.name: Wild Mongrel
cards.text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It teaches you to play dead.

cards.name: Forgotten Cave
cards.text:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Hallowed Spiritkeeper
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Hallowed Spiritkeeper dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Pestermite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Pestermite enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.
cards.flavor: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

cards.name: Sin Prodder
cards.text:
Menace
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your graveyard. If a player does, Sin Prodder deals damage to that player equal to that card's converted mana cost. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

cards.name: Yavimaya Elder
cards.text:
When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

cards.name: Tranquil Thicket
cards.text:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Flickerwisp
cards.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.

cards.name: Vendilion Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

cards.name: Goblin Heelcutter
cards.text:
Whenever Goblin Heelcutter attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Strangleroot Geist
cards.text:
Haste
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Geists of the hanged often haunt the tree on which they died.

cards.name: Ash Barrens
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Trinket Mage
cards.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may look at it, you may cast it, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.

cards.name: Dualcaster Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

cards.name: Polukranos, World Eater
cards.text:
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

cards.name: Shoreline Ranger
cards.text:
Flying
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Desecration Demon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Arrogant Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

cards.name: Guardian of the Guildpact
cards.text: Protection from monocolored
cards.flavor: The magic of the Guildpact gives aegis to the spirits pressed into its service. Upon entering the afterlife, they find new focus and are charged with defending the Guildpact against those who would see it broken.

cards.name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
cards.text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

cards.name: Krosan Tusker
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Angel of Renewal
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Renewal enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
cards.flavor: "No more fear. No more failure. No more death. No more!"

cards.name: Twisted Abomination
cards.text:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Brindle Boar
cards.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!"
—Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

cards.name: Noble Templar
cards.text:
Vigilance
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Chromatic Star
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Seal of Cleansing
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

cards.name: Shrine of Burning Rage
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

cards.name: Crawling Sensation
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

cards.name: Expedition Map
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Pyrite Spellbomb
cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Pyrite Spellbomb deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription

cards.name: Shred Memory
cards.text:
Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Chain Lightning
cards.text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Mulch
cards.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

cards.name: Spider Spawning
cards.text:
Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Renegade Freighter
cards.text:
Whenever Renegade Freighter attacks, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Radiant's Judgment
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

cards.name: Drown in Sorrow
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor:
"The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."
—Perisophia the philosopher

cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

cards.name: Travel Preparations
cards.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Visiting a shrine at the start of a journey makes the traveler more likely to finish it.

cards.name: Cultivator's Caravan
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Blessed Alliance
cards.text:
Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Target player gains 4 life.
• Untap up to two target creatures.
• Target opponent sacrifices an attacking creature.

cards.name: Dream Twist
cards.text:
Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Devour Flesh
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.
cards.flavor: His twisted mind concluded that if he was what he ate, and he wanted to stay human, . . .

cards.name: Stoke the Flames
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Sky Skiff
cards.text:
Flying
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Marshaling Cry
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Miscalculation
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Painful Truths
cards.text: Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Painful Truths.
cards.flavor: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.

cards.name: Think Twice
cards.text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist

cards.name: Expunge
cards.text:
Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Implode
cards.text:
Destroy target land.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: To save Dominaria, nine planeswalkers sought the annihilation of Phyrexia itself.

cards.name: Deep Analysis
cards.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

cards.name: Circular Logic
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Silent Departure
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

cards.name: Kytheon, Hero of Akros
cards.text:
At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
{2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Thing in the Ice
cards.text:
Defender
Thing in the Ice enters the battlefield with four ice counters on it.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, remove an ice counter from Thing in the Ice. Then if it has no ice counters on it, transform it.

cards.name: Akuta, Born of Ash
cards.text:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Bedlam Reveler
cards.text:
Bedlam Reveler costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

cards.name: Fauna Shaman
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: She wears the talismans of every creature she can evoke.

cards.name: Boros Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

cards.name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Martyred for worshipping her ancestors, she now walks among them.

cards.name: Treasure Mage
cards.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Erebos's Titan
cards.text:
As long as your opponents control no creatures, Erebos's Titan has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
Whenever a creature card leaves an opponent's graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Erebos's Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Flayer of the Hatebound
cards.text:
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever Flayer of the Hatebound or another creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

cards.name: Nissa, Vastwood Seer
cards.text:
When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

cards.name: Knights of the Black Rose
cards.text:
When Knights of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever an opponent becomes the monarch, if you were the monarch as the turn began, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "Hail to the true queen! Long may she reign!"

cards.name: Mortarpod
Azorius Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

cards.name: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
cards.flavor: "People's thoughts just come to me. Sometimes I don't know if it's them or me thinking."

cards.name: Liliana, Heretical Healer
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Chandra's Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Fires of Yavimaya
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

cards.name: Bonehoard
Dimir Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

cards.name: Mikaeus, the Lunarch
cards.text:
Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

cards.name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
{2}{G/U}{G/U}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh.
{T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

cards.name: Undermine
cards.text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
cards.flavor: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

cards.name: Golgari Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

cards.name: Emeria Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

cards.name: Toshiro Umezawa
cards.text:
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Pia and Kiran Nalaar
cards.text:
When Pia and Kiran Nalaar enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Pia and Kiran Nalaar deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Izzet Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

cards.name: Archangel Avacyn
cards.text:
Flash
Flying, vigilance
When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

cards.name: Rakdos Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

cards.name: Astral Slide
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"The hum of the universe is never off-key."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Pestilence
cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Selesnya Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

cards.name: Saproling Burst
cards.text:
Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Create a green Saproling creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst."
When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Gruul Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

cards.name: Primeval Bounty
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Orzhov Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.
It would be unfortunate if the key fell into the wrong hands.
cards.name: Key to the City
cards.text:
{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Simic Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

cards.name: Windstorm
cards.text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

cards.name: Collective Brutality
cards.text:
Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card.
• Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Desperate Ravings
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card at random.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Her mind was quite gone, yet she spoke nothing but truth.

cards.name: Memory's Journey
cards.text:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Sorin's Vengeance
cards.text: Sorin's Vengeance deals 10 damage to target player and you gain 10 life.
cards.flavor: "Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end."

cards.name: Recoup
cards.text:
Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.)
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Gnaw to the Bone
cards.text:
You gain 2 life for each creature card in your graveyard.
Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Torrent of Souls
cards.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

cards.name: Rally the Peasants
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:
"If you must go out at night, bring a mob."
—Master of the Elgaud Cathars

cards.name: Runic Repetition
cards.text: Return target exiled card with flashback you own to your hand.
cards.flavor: "What some call obsession, I call the quest for perfection."

cards.name: Ruinous Path
cards.text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Awaken 4—{5}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}{B}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

cards.name: Rekindled Flame
cards.text:
Rekindled Flame deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may return Rekindled Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Tromp the Domains
cards.text: Domain — Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: Ground into the footprints of the ravaging herd were clumps of salt from Benalia, moss from Llanowar, dust from Hurloon, and ash from as far as Urborg.

cards.name: Waves of Aggression
cards.text:
Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

cards.name: Mystic Retrieval
cards.text:
Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Mizzix's Mastery
cards.text:
Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.
Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Become Immense
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blast of Genius
cards.text: Choose target creature or player. Draw three cards, then discard a card. Blast of Genius deals damage equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost to that creature or player.
cards.flavor: Ral Zarek's brainstorms bring actual thunder and lightning.

cards.name: Battle Screech
cards.text:
Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Part the Waterveil
cards.text:
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Part the Waterveil.
Awaken 6—{6}{U}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {6}{U}{U}{U}, also put six +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

cards.name: Roar of the Wurm
cards.text:
Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Firemind's Foresight
cards.text: Search your library for an instant card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with converted mana costs 2 and 1. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Treasure Cruise
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

cards.name: Nissa's Revelation
cards.text: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

cards.name: Frantic Search
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
cards.flavor: Motivation was high in the academy once students realized flunking their exams could kill them.

cards.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
cards.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
cards.flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

cards.name: Scab-Clan Berserker
cards.text:
Haste
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if Scab-Clan Berserker is renowned, Scab-Clan Berserker deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Nucklavee
cards.text:
When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target red sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Nucklavee enters the battlefield, you may return target blue instant card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: It loathes all tastes but two: spells and flesh.

cards.name: Hero of Bladehold
cards.text:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

cards.name: Avatar of Woe
cards.text:
If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast.
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Predator Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: Dragons make for spiteful gods.

cards.name: Joraga Treespeaker
cards.text:
Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
1/2
{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
LEVEL 5+
1/4
Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Narset, Enlightened Master
cards.text:
First strike, hexproof
Whenever Narset, Enlightened Master attacks, exile the top four cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast noncreature cards exiled with Narset this turn without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Mother of Runes
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: She will not touch a weapon, yet she is the greatest protector her people have ever known.

cards.name: Inverter of Truth
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
When Inverter of Truth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your library face down, then shuffle all cards from your graveyard into your library.
cards.flavor: In its shadow, everything changed.

cards.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
cards.text:
Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered.
Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue
{R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Medomai the Ageless
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Medomai the Ageless deals combat damage to a player, take an extra turn after this one.
Medomai the Ageless can't attack during extra turns.

cards.name: Vengeful Pharaoh
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever combat damage is dealt to you or a planeswalker you control, if Vengeful Pharaoh is in your graveyard, destroy target attacking creature, then put Vengeful Pharaoh on top of your library.

cards.name: Hellrider
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to defending player.
cards.flavor:
"Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

cards.name: Genesis Hydra
cards.text:
When you cast Genesis Hydra, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library.
Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.flavor: Designed by George Fan

cards.name: Maelstrom Wanderer
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)

cards.name: Skaab Ruinator
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Skaab Ruinator, exile three creature cards from your graveyard.
Flying
You may cast Skaab Ruinator from your graveyard.

cards.name: Lotus Cobra
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

cards.name: Dragonlord Atarka
cards.text:
Flying, trample
When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.

cards.name: Cruel Ultimatum
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
cards.flavor: There is always a greater power.

cards.name: Body Double
cards.text: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.
cards.flavor: Where the dead outnumbered the living, mimics scavenged faces from the fallen.

cards.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
cards.text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.
cards.flavor: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

cards.name: Titania, Protector of Argoth
cards.text:
When Titania, Protector of Argoth enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever a land you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 5/3 green Elemental creature token.

cards.name: Trench Gorger
cards.text:
Trample
When Trench Gorger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of land cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. If you do, Trench Gorger has base power and base toughness each equal to the number of cards exiled this way.

cards.name: March of the Machines
cards.text: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)

cards.name: Goblin Trenches
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.
cards.flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

cards.name: Altar of the Brood
cards.text: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

cards.name: Akroma's Memorial
cards.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
cards.flavor:
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
—Memorial inscription

cards.name: Mystical Teachings
cards.text:
Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Sands of Time
cards.text:
Each player skips his or her untap step.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player simultaneously untaps each tapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls and taps each untapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls.
cards.flavor:
"But once, with a magician's help, Time was stopped and Day stood still."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

cards.name: Staff of Domination
cards.text:
{1}: Untap Staff of Domination.
{2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
{3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Staff of Nin
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card.
{T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"I have attuned the staff to your screams so that only I may benefit from your pain."
—Volux, disciple of Nin

cards.name: Divine Reckoning
cards.text:
Each player chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy the rest.
Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Survival of the purest.

cards.name: Spelltwine
cards.text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

cards.name: Behold the Beyond
cards.text: Discard your hand. Search your library for three cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: There is power in the abyss, in blackness more profound than the darkest dreams.

cards.name: Council's Judgment
cards.text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
cards.flavor: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

cards.name: Dig Through Time
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Corpse Dance
cards.text:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Life's Finale
cards.text: Destroy all creatures, then search target opponent's library for up to three creature cards and put them into his or her graveyard. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: The feeble resistance of the flesh is over. Phyrexia spreads its shadow over all.

cards.name: Reforge the Soul
cards.text:
Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.
Miracle {1}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
cards.flavor: In a wave of spells called the Cursemute, Avacyn cleansed the world with divine fire.

cards.name: Slice and Dice
cards.text:
Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature.
Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Din of the Fireherd
cards.text: Create a 5/5 black and red Elemental creature token. Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each black creature you control, then sacrifices a land for each red creature you control.
cards.flavor: Vengeance in stampede form.

cards.name: Arid Mesa
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Flooded Strand
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Polluted Delta
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Scalding Tarn
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Bloodstained Mire
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Windswept Heath
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Wooded Foothills
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Marsh Flats
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Misty Rainforest
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
